name: Larry Miller
text:
When you need it, they deliver.
Concrete solutions.

name: Michael Person
text: I work for them everyone is very helpful and thay check up on you if you are out for a long time. Thay give you a birthday card every year. You are known by your name not a truck number

name: John Hall (Redneck Romeo)
text: Really good concrete company. Could not ask for better.

name: Kenneth Williams
text: Never on time

name: Daniel Shutts
text: I'm here all the time. People here are great and the forklifts try to get you loaded or unloaded as fast as possible. Love this yard and the professionalism here.

name: Mark Watkins
text: Great place ! Got me in and out in an hour ! The lady at the office ( crystal ) very helpful and polite

name: Jay Jones
text: Great products , amazing staff

name: Monte Hall
text: Easy to get to

name: Franklin Rodgers
text: Awesome prices,great service! Good people to deal with.

name: Walter Boles
text: These guys are too notch! Barry has been has been just awesome to work with on a couple of very large orders A real southern straight shooter..

resp.text: Thank you for your review, we are glad you chose The Woodpile for  your building supply needs.

name: King Lewis
text: If you want quality and great service, stop on by Woodpile, the only place you need to go for all your home and construction needs.

name: Ronald French
text: This place is awesome. They have a very good selection of lumber that you can't find @ the big box stores.

name: Jason Tew
text: Nice and helpful staff and great products.

name: Mark Smith
text:
Awesome place, costumer service is excelent!!
Prices are really good.. And most important thing, construction material is always delivered on time.

name: Donna Morris
text: They have every thing when it comes to lumber!!  Friendly staff!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.

name: Tami Smith
text: Great Company, recommend to anyone building or remodiling.

resp.text: We are so happy for your feedback

name: Edgar Alcantar
text: Almost anything you can look forward to home repairs and new construction, visit us and you wil not regret

name: LD Henderson
text: They have some really nice cedar grill tables. People are really friendly there.

name: Tim Sowell
text: I live in Florida and purchase all my lumber supplies from the wood pile

resp.text: We put customer experience and satisfaction as our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. Our team thank you.

name: Paul Meyers
text: Interesting place.  Helpful staff.

name: Sharon Vickers Hoefle
text: Awesome service

name: Brandon Whitlock
text: Waste of time. Very limited inventory. Appears almost everything has to be ordered.

resp.text: I'm sorry to hear about your bad experience. One of our strengths is being able to get the customer exactly what they need and a lot of the time, that requires special orders. We'd love to hear from you again on how we can assist you on you project!

name: Zac Lott
text: Excellent staff and competitive pricing . These guys are spot on with information and delivery times. The store and warehouse has everything you need to get the job done!

name: Michael B. Bishop
text: Great construction company. Experienced group that you can trust.

name: Lauren’s life! (tnp61579)
text: Had straight line winds come through and knock down a 🌲.  They came and fixed everything guy was super nice but not long after I started getting cracks is the ceiling.  Took a long time for them to come back after tons of emails.  Said they would put up some low  profile exposed beams to cover  the crack (not structural) Heat and cool flex.  Never heard from them again.

name: Jerry Nelson
text: One of the best jobs I've had in years. It's hard work, but pays the Bill's. Plus I like the people I work with.

name: Matthew Sherrod
text:
I do alot of work for mostly the Son jay,and it has always been a pleasure.on the few occassions i have worked for the dad, mr.gauntney things went smooth.
This is one of the oldest construction bussiness's in the shoals.since the 50s i believe they have serving the area and i am honored any time they ask me to Help with a project.
Been a blessing to me and my family.
Thanky jay.

name: Barbara Skipper
text: The people in the office are great! I'm looking for a job, so it would be nice to deal with nice people everyday!

name: Deserves Better
text: The Son is cool but the owner is a racist I honestly believe.

name: Terry Alldredge
text: Knowledgeable and helpful. Gave adive and quick service. Highly recommend.

name: James Cowart
text: They were extremely helpful and   had me on my way. Take cash or check...they don't accept card's.

name: k12c10
text: Owners are very helpful and very reasonable!

name: edward Green
text: Great people. .great products. ..great prices. .

name: Cullman3053 Keystone
text: Bear concrete products has a unique inventory only found here. From plastic pipe to septic systems and Block retainer wall. Customers come from all over Alabama and Mississippi to buy here.

name: Jerry Ferrell
text: Very helpfully  friendly

name: Gary Hill
text: They have a lot of things you cant find elsewhere

name: Mike Curtis
text: Had every thing we needed .
